overview: * Currently "In Production and Post Production" as a Theatrical Film. *  A Story of Courage and Heart! * Retired Colonel Jack Rogan looks to discover the truth when his wife Danielle was kidnapped by uncovering the mystery that brings some newcomers to town and reduced the worlds population to less than 1,000,000.
tagline: When the going gets tough, retired Colonel Jack Rogan gets going!
title: Lost Angels (The Discovery)
